comment:
* Contains CMAS (Commercial Mobile Alert System) warning notification Type 1 elements for a
 * {@link SmsCbMessage}.
 * Supported values for each element are defined in TIA-1149-0-1 (CMAS over CDMA) and
 * 3GPP TS 23.041 (for GSM/UMTS).
 *
 * {@hide}

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_PRESIDENTIAL_LEVEL_ALERT
variables.comment: Presidential-level alert (Korean Public Alert System Class 0 message).

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_EXTREME_THREAT
variables.comment: Extreme threat to life and property (Korean Public Alert System Class 1 message).

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_SEVERE_THREAT
variables.comment: Severe threat to life and property (Korean Public Alert System Class 1 message).

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_CHILD_ABDUCTION_EMERGENCY
variables.comment: Child abduction emergency (AMBER Alert).

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_REQUIRED_MONTHLY_TEST
variables.comment: CMAS test message.

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_CMAS_EXERCISE
variables.comment: CMAS exercise.

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_OPERATOR_DEFINED_USE
variables.comment: CMAS category for operator defined use.

variables.name: CMAS_CLASS_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: CMAS category for warning types that are reserved for future extension.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_GEO
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Geophysical including landslide.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_MET
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Meteorological including flood.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_SAFETY
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: General emergency and public safety.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_SECURITY
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Law enforcement, military, homeland/local/private security.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_RESCUE
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Rescue and recovery.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_FIRE
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Fire suppression and rescue.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_HEALTH
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Medical and public health.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_ENV
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Pollution and other environmental.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_TRANSPORT
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Public and private transportation.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_INFRA
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Utility, telecom, other non-transport infrastructure.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_CBRNE
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Chem, bio, radiological, nuclear, high explosive threat or attack.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_OTHER
variables.comment: CMAS alert category: Other events.

variables.name: CMAS_CATEGORY_UNKNOWN
variables.comment:
* CMAS alert category is unknown. The category is only available for CDMA broadcasts
     * containing a type 1 elements record, so GSM and UMTS broadcasts always return unknown.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_SHELTER
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Take shelter in place.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_EVACUATE
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Evacuate (Relocate).

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_PREPARE
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Make preparations.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_EXECUTE
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Execute a pre-planned activity.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_MONITOR
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Attend to information sources.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_AVOID
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Avoid hazard.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_ASSESS
variables.comment: CMAS response type: Evaluate the information in this message (not for public warnings).

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_NONE
variables.comment: CMAS response type: No action recommended.

variables.name: CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_UNKNOWN
variables.comment:
* CMAS response type is unknown. The response type is only available for CDMA broadcasts
     * containing a type 1 elements record, so GSM and UMTS broadcasts always return unknown.

variables.name: CMAS_SEVERITY_EXTREME
variables.comment: CMAS severity type: Extraordinary threat to life or property.

variables.name: CMAS_SEVERITY_SEVERE
variables.comment: CMAS severity type: Significant threat to life or property.

variables.name: CMAS_SEVERITY_UNKNOWN
variables.comment:
* CMAS alert severity is unknown. The severity is available for CDMA warning alerts
     * containing a type 1 elements record and for all GSM and UMTS alerts except for the
     * Presidential-level alert class (Korean Public Alert System Class 0).

variables.name: CMAS_URGENCY_IMMEDIATE
variables.comment: CMAS urgency type: Responsive action should be taken immediately.

variables.name: CMAS_URGENCY_EXPECTED
variables.comment: CMAS urgency type: Responsive action should be taken within the next hour.

variables.name: CMAS_URGENCY_UNKNOWN
variables.comment:
* CMAS alert urgency is unknown. The urgency is available for CDMA warning alerts
     * containing a type 1 elements record and for all GSM and UMTS alerts except for the
     * Presidential-level alert class (Korean Public Alert System Class 0).

variables.name: CMAS_CERTAINTY_OBSERVED
variables.comment: CMAS certainty type: Determined to have occurred or to be ongoing.

variables.name: CMAS_CERTAINTY_LIKELY
variables.comment: CMAS certainty type: Likely (probability > ~50%).

variables.name: CMAS_CERTAINTY_UNKNOWN
variables.comment:
* CMAS alert certainty is unknown. The certainty is available for CDMA warning alerts
     * containing a type 1 elements record and for all GSM and UMTS alerts except for the
     * Presidential-level alert class (Korean Public Alert System Class 0).

variables.name: mMessageClass
variables.comment: CMAS message class.

variables.name: mCategory
variables.comment: CMAS category.

variables.name: mResponseType
variables.comment: CMAS response type.

variables.name: mSeverity
variables.comment: CMAS severity.

variables.name: mUrgency
variables.comment: CMAS urgency.

variables.name: mCertainty
variables.comment: CMAS certainty.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: Creator for unparcelling objects.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Flatten this object into a Parcel.
     *
     * @param dest  The Parcel in which the object should be written.
     * @param flags Additional flags about how the object should be written (ignored).

methods.name: public int getMessageClass()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CMAS message class, e.g. {@link #CMAS_CLASS_PRESIDENTIAL_LEVEL_ALERT}.
     * @return one of the {@code CMAS_CLASS} values

methods.name: public int getCategory()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CMAS category, e.g. {@link #CMAS_CATEGORY_GEO}.
     * @return one of the {@code CMAS_CATEGORY} values

methods.name: public int getResponseType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CMAS response type, e.g. {@link #CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE_SHELTER}.
     * @return one of the {@code CMAS_RESPONSE_TYPE} values

methods.name: public int getSeverity()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CMAS severity, e.g. {@link #CMAS_SEVERITY_EXTREME}.
     * @return one of the {@code CMAS_SEVERITY} values

methods.name: public int getUrgency()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CMAS urgency, e.g. {@link #CMAS_URGENCY_IMMEDIATE}.
     * @return one of the {@code CMAS_URGENCY} values

methods.name: public int getCertainty()
methods.comment:
* Returns the CMAS certainty, e.g. {@link #CMAS_CERTAINTY_OBSERVED}.
     *
     * @return one of the {@code CMAS_CERTAINTY} values

methods.name: public int describeContents()
methods.comment:
* Describe the kinds of special objects contained in the marshalled representation.
     *
     * @return a bitmask indicating this Parcelable contains no special objects

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
